storyInfo: As the Legati and envoys of all nations congregate in Laterano, Cecelia, a resident of the outskirts, loses her mother. Her mother's final words: 'Leave Laterano.'

attributes.text: The man steps into the room. The woman in the wheelchair utters not a word.
He tidies up the notes and documents scattered across the table.
He swaps the withered flowers in the vase out for fresh ones.
She continues reading her newly borrowed book, as if she takes no notice of him.
Perhaps because all there is to say has long since been said.
Or perhaps because it is not yet time for that which shouldn't be said.

attributes.content: She'll be back soon.
attributes.name: Wasting Man

attributes.content: The Legati spent so long preparing for this meeting. Of course she will.
attributes.name: Quiet Woman

attributes.content: How long will you stay?
attributes.name: Quiet Woman

attributes.content: Until I finish what I must do.
attributes.name: Wasting Man

attributes.content: For all I can accomplish here is the delivery of the Lateran people's souls.
attributes.name: Wasting Man

attributes.content: I should go.
attributes.name: Wasting Man

attributes.content: Don't come back.
attributes.name: Quiet Woman

attributes.text: The man stands silent for a while, before turning and leaving the room.
The woman pushes her wheelchair up to the window.
She opens it, and looks out.
She's watched the sun rise and set over Laterano countless times through this window frame.
The city is as noisy as ever tonight, the Laterans being strangers to both tranquility and exhaustion.

attributes.content: Mamma, drink some hot water.
attributes.name: Cecelia

attributes.content: Good girl, *cough* *cough*... Mamma's alright.
attributes.name: Sickly Mother

attributes.content: Mamma... I'll read you a storybook.
attributes.name: Cecelia

attributes.content: Cecelia, my darling Cecelia.
attributes.name: Sickly Mother

attributes.content: Mamma really hates to leave you.
attributes.name: Sickly Mother

attributes.content: Are you going to leave me, Mamma?
attributes.name: Cecelia

attributes.content: No, *cough* *cough*... Mamma's never, ever wanted... to leave you...
attributes.name: Sickly Mother

attributes.content: She's just got no choice...
attributes.name: Sickly Mother

attributes.content: Where are you going, Mamma? Can I go with you too? Is that okay?
attributes.name: Cecelia

attributes.content: You can't go where I'm about to go, Cecelia... It's very cold, very lonely, and so, so empty.
attributes.name: Sickly Mother

attributes.content: I'll go with you, I'll be with you so you won't be lonely.
attributes.name: Cecelia

attributes.content: ...I'm sorry, Cecelia.
attributes.name: Sickly Mother

attributes.content: Your childhood should have been so much more blessed...
attributes.name: Sickly Mother

attributes.content: I HAVE been blessed. With you, Mamma.
attributes.name: Cecelia

attributes.content: Cecelia... Cecelia. Listen now, listen.
attributes.name: Sickly Mother

attributes.content: I'm listening, Mamma.
attributes.name: Cecelia

attributes.content: I won't be able to look after you soon... Someone will come pick you up.
attributes.name: Sickly Mother

attributes.content: Go with him. He'll take you to Papà.
attributes.name: Sickly Mother

attributes.content: Papà will look after you for me, okay?
attributes.name: Sickly Mother

attributes.content: Can't you come with me? I bet Papà really wants to see you...
attributes.name: Cecelia

attributes.content: Mamma... has something important to do... So I can't go with you.
attributes.name: Sickly Mother

attributes.content: Once you see Papà, tell him that your Mamma really misses him too.
attributes.name: Sickly Mother

attributes.content: Also, tell him... I'm sorry. Okay?
attributes.name: Sickly Mother

attributes.content: Mamma, what are you sorry for?
attributes.name: Cecelia

attributes.content: Listen to me, listen to your Mamma, Cecelia!
attributes.name: Sickly Mother

attributes.content: I will, Mamma... Don't cry...
attributes.name: Cecelia

attributes.content: Cecelia, my poor Cecelia... Giving birth to you was the greatest blessing in my life. But what if you find it a lifelong curse... my child, my beloved daughter...
attributes.name: Sickly Mother

attributes.content: Who will bless you? Who can?
attributes.name: Sickly Mother

attributes.content: Cecelia, my darling Cecelia... Hide yourself. Don't let them find you...
attributes.name: Sickly Mother

attributes.content: Run away... leave Laterano...
attributes.name: Sickly Mother

attributes.content: The mother holds her daughter's hands. Through her eyes flash myriad emotions, until finally all strength fades from them.
And they slowly, gently fall shut.
Mamma...?
attributes.name: Cecelia

attributes.content: The Sankta girl does not know what's happened.
When she notices her mother's hands have turned cold, she clasps them together against her own chest, hoping to provide some warmth to her.
There's a knock on the door.
Executor Federico of the Laterano Notarial Hall, on official business. Please open the door.
Sir, your check-in at the guesthouse has been taken care of.
attributes.name: Cheery Legatus

attributes.content: The rest of your day is completely free! Might not be a bad idea to have a look around. You seemed quite eager the whole way.
attributes.name: Cheery Legatus

attributes.content: Hmm—
attributes.name: Columbian Magnate

attributes.content: Lateran City has some very distinct architecture.
attributes.name: Columbian Magnate

attributes.content: You see? Wasn't it worth the trip?
attributes.name: Cheery Legatus

attributes.content: I suppose it was.
attributes.name: Columbian Magnate

attributes.content: What's the schedule for tomorrow?
attributes.name: Columbian Magnate

attributes.content: Your meeting with His Holiness the Apostle, our Pope, is all set, so I'll be returning to the Basilica now. I'll fetch you tomorrow when it's time to meet him.
attributes.name: Cheery Legatus

attributes.content: Please enjoy your stay in Laterano during the conference. No need to worry about expenses; it is our honor to host VIPs from the world over.
attributes.name: Cheery Legatus

attributes.content: The world over... *sigh* I sure don't see how gathering all these foreigners in one place is gonna get anything done.
attributes.name: Columbian Magnate

attributes.content: Still, how could I refuse such a generous invitation from His Holiness? Might as well take advantage of his hospitality while I'm here.
attributes.name: Columbian Magnate

attributes.content: Excellent, now if you'll excuse me. Feel free to take Laterano by storm.
attributes.name: Cheery Legatus

attributes.content: The architecture here sure is interesting. Columbia uses pillars like these too, but there're subtle differences...
attributes.name: Columbian Magnate

attributes.content: Hmm. Seeing as I'm here...
attributes.name: Columbian Magnate

attributes.content: Hm? What are they up to over there?
attributes.name: Columbian Magnate

attributes.content: All set up?
attributes.name: Brisk Lateran Citizen

attributes.content: I'm good. How's your end?
attributes.name: Sedate Lateran Citizen

attributes.content: Done. Ezell, have we dispersed everyone in the area?
attributes.name: Brisk Lateran Citizen

attributes.content: All the citizens likely to be directly affected, yes. Those in the secondary effect range are confirmed to be notified as well.
attributes.name: Ezell

attributes.content: Shall we get started then?
attributes.name: Brisk Lateran Citizen

attributes.content: Mm-hm... Current time is 10:22, on March 15th, 1099. The following act of demolition is carried out with Reserve Executor Ezell of the Notarial Hall as witness.
attributes.name: Ezell

attributes.content: Alright. Here goes, three—
attributes.name: Brisk Lateran Citizen

attributes.content: (What're those three Sankta doing standing around that pillar?)
attributes.name: Columbian Magnate

attributes.content: Two—
attributes.name: Brisk Lateran Citizen

attributes.content: You three are the only ones around here. What gives?
attributes.name: Columbian Magnate

attributes.content: One, fire!—Huh, where'd you come from?!
attributes.name: Brisk Lateran Citizen

attributes.content: What?! What was that explosion?! ...Something's coming down!
attributes.name: Columbian Magnate

attributes.content: Save me, save me! Eeeek—!
attributes.name: Columbian Magnate

attributes.content: I have to... what? The pillar's falling a lot slower now...
attributes.name: Ezell

attributes.content: Save—
attributes.name: Columbian Magnate

attributes.content: Cram it.
Eeek—
attributes.name: Columbian Magnate

attributes.content: Huff... huff...
attributes.name: Columbian Magnate

attributes.content: Th-That scared the skin off of me! What kind of crazy place is Laterano?! Whoever you are, Liberi, thank you for rescuing me.
attributes.name: Columbian Magnate

attributes.content: What's your name? Find me at the Columbian Provisional Association, and I'll return the favor.
attributes.name: Columbian Magnate

attributes.content: She's called Shimmering Vigil.
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: Shimmering Vigil...? Lateran names sure do sound silly sometimes...
attributes.name: Columbian Magnate

attributes.content: That's not my name.
attributes.name: Shimmering Vigil

attributes.content: Hi... you're okay, right?!
attributes.name: Brisk Lateran Citizen

attributes.content: Thanks, you two. That could've been a disaster.
attributes.name: Sedate Lateran Citizen

attributes.content: Thank you for your aid.
attributes.name: Ezell

attributes.content: You're welcome.
attributes.name: The Liberi Formerly Known As Shimmering Vigil

attributes.content: Say, what's going on here though? Bombings in the middle of the day? Don't tell me you have extremists sneaking in?
attributes.name: Columbian Magnate

attributes.content: Uh...
attributes.name: Brisk Lateran Citizen

attributes.content: Something's been on my mind.
attributes.name: Brisk Lateran Citizen

attributes.content: Go on.
attributes.name: Sedate Lateran Citizen

attributes.content: Do you think this pillar is absolutely perfectly positioned, or no?
attributes.name: Brisk Lateran Citizen

attributes.content: I would say so; it fully embodies Laterano's architectural aesthetics. So?
attributes.name: Sedate Lateran Citizen

attributes.content: So... I can't help but wanna see what would happen if we blew it up.
attributes.name: Brisk Lateran Citizen

attributes.content: Ahh—
attributes.name: Sedate Lateran Citizen

attributes.content: I have to admit, it's a fine idea.
attributes.name: Sedate? Lateran Citizen

attributes.content: But the conference is starting soon, right? I heard there'll be a lotta people from afar. I think His Holiness even said we should show some restraint for a while.
attributes.name: Brisk Lateran Citizen

attributes.content: He did.
attributes.name: Sedate? Lateran Citizen

attributes.content: However, he said 'show some restraint', not 'don't do anything'.
attributes.name: Sedate?? Lateran Citizen

attributes.content: I get that His Holiness is hoping to give the visitors a good impression. But, my dear friend, what do you say to my humblest of opinions? I think a 'good impression' must be based on reality.
attributes.name: Brisk Lateran Citizen

attributes.content: You couldn't be more correct, my friend.
attributes.name: Not Very Sedate Lateran Citizen

attributes.content: So, we filed with the Notarial Hall, got our executor here to witness for us, and evacuated everyone nearby...
attributes.name: Brisk Lateran Citizen

attributes.content: Before giving this beautiful pillar just the perfect blast...
attributes.name: Brisk Lateran Citizen

attributes.content: Except, we never expected you to show up right at that moment.
attributes.name: Sedate Lateran Citizen

attributes.content: We're so sorry, esteemed sir, for unwittingly doing you harm.
attributes.name: Brisk Lateran Citizen

attributes.content: You... set off an explosion on a nomadic city street? And filed with the government... for an official witness?! Were you... you Laterans always this... uninhibited?
attributes.name: Columbian Magnate

attributes.content: Of course we abide by the Commandments and all relevant regulations.
attributes.name: The Liberi Formerly Known As Shimmering Vigil

attributes.content: But if it's not explicitly forbidden, anything's fair game. And Lateran City values and protects every citizen's rights.
attributes.name: The Liberi Formerly Known As Shimmering Vigil

attributes.content: Don't worry, sir. Just your average everyday explosion, perfectly normal.
attributes.name: Ezell

attributes.content: What if someone gets hurt...?
attributes.name: Columbian Magnate

attributes.content: We know our limits. That said, I'd also like to extend my apologies to you for this accident.
attributes.name: Ezell

attributes.content: Truly sorry, sir.
attributes.name: Sedate Lateran Citizen

attributes.content: Maybe it hasn't quite sunk in for you yet, but believe me, stay long enough and you'll learn to love this city.
attributes.name: Brisk Lateran Citizen

attributes.content: Er... I think I can live without that sinking in.
attributes.name: Columbian Magnate

attributes.content: And there you have it.
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: Welcome to Laterano, sir.
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: Tut-tut, if it isn't Mostima. Just what is her ability? Is she slowing down time, or merely tricking people into perceiving it that way?
It blows my mind every time.
Oren, what's going on over there?
attributes.name: Reserved Legatus

attributes.content: Not much, just a normal day in my lovely hometown.
attributes.name: Oren

attributes.content: Though I did get a better show than expected.
attributes.name: Oren

attributes.content: The others are waiting for us.
attributes.name: Reserved Legatus

attributes.content: I know. Let's go.
attributes.name: Oren

attributes.content: The Legati.
A special Messenger division established under the auspices of the incumbent Pope.
Laterano had previously held a detached position, maintaining neutrality among the central powers.
As such, Lateran officials were sometimes tasked by foreign powers with relaying critical information between different parties in the course of diplomacy.
This role was normalized and institutionalized with the establishment of the Legatus system. They have become a special force moving between the nations.
With Laterano's absolute neutrality as a foundation, the Legati aim to promote the circulation of important information between countries.
1098: via the Legati, the Pope sends an invitation to all nations of Terra:
'Gather for a conference at Laterano. I invite every nation to dispatch its envoys for a discussion regarding our collective security.'
1099: the Legatus system celebrates its thirtieth anniversary.
In March of that year, Legati from all across Terra proceed for Laterano together with the envoys of numerous nations.
One of those two just now seemed a lot like a Pontifica Cohors, and the other... was that a Legatus?
attributes.name: Ezell

attributes.content: A strange combination.
attributes.name: Ezell

attributes.content: Ezell, are you gonna stick around now that your witness work's done?
attributes.name: Brisk Lateran Citizen

attributes.content: Don't worry, we'll rebuild the pillar as good as new, just like we wrote in our application.
attributes.name: Sedate Lateran Citizen

attributes.content: Good, I'll leave you to it then. I'll be going now, I've still got quite a bit on my plate.
attributes.name: Ezell

attributes.content: Er. Just to confirm, I'm looking for a will registered by someone who's... passed away?
attributes.name: Ezell

attributes.content: A typical single woman's residence, with no trace of any other occupants.
In the bedroom, her body lies serenely. No signs of poisoning, no signs of violence.
Federico here.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: Female citizen's body discovered at 7-265 Via Thervatius, Pagus Stevonus.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: Preliminary determination of the cause of death: natural. Please notify the Ecclesia Requietum of the pagus to come and inter the remains.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: Preliminary search found no last will and testament. Please initiate new assignment: confirm deceased's identity, search for will according to any pre-registered information.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: Federico out.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: Mamma...
attributes.name: Cecelia

attributes.content: Don't go out.
Don't let anyone else find you.
Never, ever approach anyone in uniform.
That's what Mamma said.
Is the uniform man gone? Or still here?
It's alright. When someone visits, just take a nap on your little sofa, just like always. You can go back to Mamma when you wake up.
Don't panic... Cecelia. Why are you so worried?
Why can't you fall asleep?
It's okay, it's okay... you just need to wait for the stranger to leave.
It'll all be alright when you're with Mamma again.
Seems things went pretty well in Sargon, huh? They sent out a whole bunch of envoys.
attributes.name: Oren

attributes.content: Don't get me started. The pashas are all eager enough, but the problem is none of them can agree on anything.
attributes.name: Reluctant Legatus

attributes.content: I'm already thanking Heaven they haven't started brawling yet.
attributes.name: Reluctant Legatus

attributes.content: What about Kazimierz? Their military's sizeable, no matter how you slice it.
attributes.name: Oren

attributes.content: The Adeptus Sprawiedliwi turned down our proposal, but the K.G.C.C. was actually very interested.
attributes.name: Calm Legatus

attributes.content: One rep even sought me out.
attributes.name: Calm Legatus

attributes.content: We had a long chat... he understood the international situation as well as any Legatus.
attributes.name: Calm Legatus

attributes.content: He might even come in person, if he's not too busy.
attributes.name: Calm Legatus

attributes.content: But enough about us. How about you, Oren?
attributes.name: Reluctant Legatus

attributes.content: The situation in Victoria is anything but simple these days. I'm sure you've heard a thing or two.
attributes.name: Oren

attributes.content: Duke Gododdin and I get along fine, but... it's less that he doesn't want to appoint anyone to be here, and more that he CAN'T.
attributes.name: Oren

attributes.content: Everything's balanced on a knife's edge, more or less.
attributes.name: Oren

attributes.content: Yan didn't dispatch anyone either. Not that they didn't send a stream of gifts 'conveying our thanks to His Holiness'... How very Yanese of them.
attributes.name: Reluctant Legatus

attributes.content: Kjerag actually sent out a few, after rising to prominence these last two years... and every other nation's envoys are already here.
attributes.name: Calm Legatus

attributes.content: To be honest, I never imagined this job would go so smoothly.
attributes.name: Reluctant Legatus

attributes.content: Scared?
attributes.name: Oren

attributes.content: A little bit.
attributes.name: Reluctant Legatus

attributes.content: You haven't been a Legatus for too long, if I remember right.
attributes.name: Oren

attributes.content: Less than four years, I guess.
attributes.name: Reluctant Legatus

attributes.content: But our organization has been active for thirty years now.
attributes.name: Oren

attributes.content: After all our efforts, I'd say every last one of us has earned these results.
attributes.name: Oren

attributes.content: Besides, we're still a long way off from what we're hoping for—a true 'Summit of Nations', right?
attributes.name: Oren

attributes.content: We need more than envoys showing up in the Lateran Basilica audience hall. We need the people in power, the ones who can actually change things.
attributes.name: Oren

attributes.content: So save your nerves for the day we have to greet the big guns instead.
attributes.name: Oren

attributes.content: Thanks for putting it like that—now I've got no idea if I should be excited or terrified.
attributes.name: Reluctant Legatus

attributes.content: I see you can't stop yourself from terrorizing the newbies, Oren.
attributes.name: Velliv

attributes.content: You wound me.
attributes.name: Oren

attributes.content: Nothing to get keyed up about, even if that day really comes.
attributes.name: Velliv

attributes.content: That's what we're qualified for, aren't we?
attributes.name: Velliv

attributes.content: Maybe so.
attributes.name: Oren

attributes.content: So, are the acting Legati of each region all present?
attributes.name: Velliv

attributes.content: We're only missing Mostima.
attributes.name: Reluctant Legatus

attributes.content: Mostima? Ooh, I just happened to see her.
attributes.name: Oren

attributes.content: What's she doing?
attributes.name: Velliv

attributes.content: Right now? Taking in her native air again.
attributes.name: Oren

attributes.content: Ah, forget her. We were never counting on her to come anyway.
attributes.name: Velliv

attributes.content: She can report to His Holiness last and we're good, just like always.
attributes.name: Velliv

attributes.content: Sanctitas advenit.
attributes.name: Apostolic Knight

attributes.content: In a split second, the hall is silent and still.
All of the Messengers' gazes lie on one spot.
The teacher of all Laterano, their guide, their spiritual leader—
Good morning, children. Have you had breakfast yet?
attributes.name: The Pope

attributes.content: Well?
attributes.name: Pious Sister

attributes.content: No sign of external force. It was likely due to illness.
attributes.name: Stoic Sister

attributes.content: A pitiable soul. May she not ail so on the other side.
attributes.name: Pious Sister

attributes.content: Dimming Sankta, your remains shall be conferred unto the Ecclesia Requietum, where you shall rest.
attributes.name: Stoic Sister

attributes.content: Here, this was hung on the bedroom wall. Hand it to a member of the Notarial Hall.
attributes.name: Pious Sister

attributes.content: Why did they take Mamma away...?
attributes.name: Cecelia

attributes.content: What... do I do...?
attributes.name: Cecelia

attributes.content: Cecelia casts her gaze to the entrance.
You can't go out, you can't be found... or else you'll be in danger, Cecelia.
That's what Mamma said.
But if Mamma got taken away, will she be in danger too?
Fiammetta...
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: Wait, you're actually using my name for once? What gives?
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: Aw, you don't like it? More a fan of 'Shimmering Vigil', then? Or do you want a new one?
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: Fiammetta's fine, thanks. Seriously though, what is it?
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: Say... my lovely coworkers should be in the Lateran Basilica right about now, no? Reminiscing about me, maybe?
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: If you're aware, then maybe you should show your face for once.
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: Nah, forget it, I'll never get used to the ambience in there.
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: Besides, who'd want to see a living warning sign rock on in there? They'd just be uncomfortable.
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: Since when do you care if other people are uncomfortable?
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: I'm not so bored I'd make myself unwelcome just for fun.
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: Objection: case in point. I'll admit you're enjoying being back here a lot more than I expected, though.
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: Really?
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: 'Welcome to Laterano' and all that.
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: Ah, I think I'm just in high spirits. Probably from coming home after so long.
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: Yeah right.
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: Hahah, sure, whatever, let's go.
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: Where to?
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: To see her, of course.
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: Oh, maybe she's in a different hospital now?
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: It's been ages since the last time you returned, after all.
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: Follow me.
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: I haven't been to this pagus too often. It seems not too far from the outskirts... I should be nearly there, right? 7-265, Via Thervatius...
attributes.name: Ezell

attributes.content: Is that an... Ecclesia Requietum hearse stopped by that door?
attributes.name: Ezell

attributes.content: Hello? Excuse me, Sister!
attributes.name: Ezell

attributes.content: Calm down, young executor.
attributes.name: Stoic Sister

attributes.content: Have you finished the inspection already?
attributes.name: Ezell

attributes.content: Correct. There was a Sankta who departed us by illness.
attributes.name: Pious Sister

attributes.content: May I quickly verify the remains?
attributes.name: Ezell

attributes.content: Confirmation complete. The deceased is the homeowner Feoria La Porta.
attributes.name: Ezell

attributes.content: My assignment mentioned no will was discovered nearby. May I ask if you noticed anything resembling one during your inspection?
attributes.name: Ezell

attributes.content: We did not. However, this is for you... the Notarial Hall would wish to reclaim it, correct?
attributes.name: Stoic Sister

attributes.content: Is this... her patron firearm? Understood, I'll take it back with me. Thank you both.
attributes.name: Ezell

attributes.content: If you're done with the identity check and arms reclamation, please allow us to convey her to the Ecclesia Requietum.
attributes.name: Pious Sister

attributes.content: Ah, very well. Thank you for your time.
attributes.name: Ezell

attributes.content: Identity of the deceased confirmed. If I want to find any pre-registration of a will through the Notarial Hall system... Right, I can do a long-ranged search from my terminal...
attributes.name: Ezell

attributes.content: Census addresses... homeowners...
attributes.name: Ezell

attributes.content: Er, she didn't prepare a will?
attributes.name: Ezell

attributes.content: The diagnosis record states...
attributes.name: Ezell

attributes.content: Ah, given the illness, giving up on hospital treatment makes sense... but why wouldn't she leave a will...?
attributes.name: Ezell

attributes.content: Hm...? Is that a neighbor's child? Why is she hiding from me...?
attributes.name: Ezell

attributes.content: Watch out!
attributes.name: Ezell

attributes.content: Wha—did she faint? But why? She only tripped...
attributes.name: Ezell

attributes.content: Does anyone know who this child's parents are?! Does she live nearby?
attributes.name: Ezell

attributes.content: I've never seen her before. Is she passed out...? What if she bumped her head when she fell?
attributes.name: Troubled Lateran Citizen

attributes.content: I've never seen her either. Maybe she just moved in? I can ask around at the neighborhood hall.
attributes.name: Composed Lateran Citizen

attributes.content: What for?! If she's hit her head, then we need to get her to the hospital!
attributes.name: Ardent Lateran Citizen

attributes.content: You hurry and take her there, executor. We live just around here. If her parents come looking, we'll point them straight to the hospital to find you.
attributes.name: Ardent Lateran Citizen

attributes.content: Perfect, thank you all!
attributes.name: Ezell

attributes.content: Grr... I didn't think Cecelia would run straight into a Notarial right outside her home...
attributes.name: Lateran Citizen?

attributes.content: What now, Patia?
attributes.name: Lateran Citizen?

attributes.content: What else? Follow them, make sure she's safe... and get her out of the Notarial Hall's hands!
attributes.name: Patia
